Module dev.blaauwendraad.masker.json

Package dev.blaauwendraad.masker.json

@NullMarked package dev.blaauwendraad.masker.json
This package contains the JsonMasker, main entrypoint for masking the JSON. Additionally, the package contains ValueMasker for low-level masking customization and ValueMaskers for out-of-the-box maskers.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    dev.blaauwendraad.masker.json.config
    This package contains configuration and builders for creating a JsonMasker instance
    dev.blaauwendraad.masker.json.path
    This package contains internal configuration for the JSONPath support.
    dev.blaauwendraad.masker.json.util
    This package contains internal utilities.
  • Class
    Description
    InvalidJsonException
    Calling any of the mask methods of the JsonMasker can result in two cases: In case valid JSON was provided, valid JSON is returned according to the provided masking configurations In case invalid JSON was provided, the exception defined in this class is thrown
    JsonMasker
    Masker that can be used to mask JSON objects and arrays.
    ValueMasker
    A functional interface which enables masking JSON values (boolean, numbers, and strings) in almost every imaginable way.
    ValueMasker.AnyValueMasker
    ValueMasker that can mask any JSON value (string, number or a boolean).
    ValueMasker.BooleanMasker
    ValueMasker that can mask JSON boolean values.
    ValueMasker.NumberMasker
    ValueMasker that can mask JSON number values.
    ValueMasker.StringMasker
    ValueMasker that can mask JSON string values.
    ValueMaskerContext
    Represents the original value that is currently being masked.
    ValueMaskers
    Provides out-of-the-box implementations of ValueMasker.
